sys_script.name: Save user details

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_08c395ff47b3b11014300592e36d43a0
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1025229_topup_0_request_details</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Save user details</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	var loggedInUser = gs.getUserName();
	//gs.getUser().getID();
	var userQuery = new GlideRecord('x_1025229_topup_0_user_details');
	userQuery.addQuery('user_name',loggedInUser);
	userQuery.query();

	if(userQuery.next()){
		current.user_name = userQuery.user_name;
		current.name = userQuery.name;
		current.email = userQuery.email;
		current.contact = userQuery.contact;
		current.project = userQuery.project;
		current.manager = userQuery.manager;
		current.card_number = userQuery.card_number;
		current.bank_name = userQuery.bank_name; 
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-24 16:39:14</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>08c395ff47b3b11014300592e36d43a0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Save user details</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Topup Travel Card" source="x_1025229_topup_0">6cd82a054777311014300592e36d43d6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Topup Travel Card">6cd82a054777311014300592e36d43d6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_08c395ff47b3b11014300592e36d43a0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-30 11:42:19</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=08c395ff47b3b11014300592e36d43a0"/></record_update>
